On Thursday, November 20, 2003, at 5:23:31 PM, Chappell, Simon P wrote:

>>> How about
>>
>>>         assertEquals(a.equals(b), b.equals(a));
>>
>>> which makes the test obviously about symmetry.
>>
>>That's really hard to think about. And they could both be wrong ...

> But they'd be wrong symmetrically! ;-) And besides, you'd have a couple of other tests to prove the
> actually equality of the matter. So I think that as a test of symmetry, this is a neat way of writing it.

It's too cute, IMO. Too easy to be proud of. Too easy to want to say "hey,
look, this is cool!"

Ron Jeffries
www.XProgramming.com
